channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Multiple FEMA staff put on leave after letter criticizing Trump admin
item.description: Multiple FEMA staff who signed an open letter criticizing the Trump administration's budget cuts to disaster preparedness were placed on leave Tuesday...

item.title: Cracker Barrel returning to "Old Timer" logo after MAGA backlash
item.description: Cracker Barrel is dropping its new logo and returning to the "Old Timer" design after criticism from some customers, including MAGA figures who decrie...

item.title: Indian PM Modi issues buy India-made call as Trump's 50% tariffs take effect
item.description: President Trump's 50% tariffs on India took effect on Wednesday, prompting Indian officials to urge citizens to buy more products made in the country....

item.title: NAACP asks court to block new Texas congressional map
item.description: The nation’s largest civil rights organization argues the newly redrawn boundary lines, which the Texas state legislature voted to adopt last week, ar...

item.title: Trump’s flag-burning order tests a Supreme Court ruling. Here’s how.
item.description: In the 1989 case Texas v. Johnson, flag burning as political protest was ruled to be protected First Amendment speech. Trump’s order could revisit tha...

item.title: Trump officials discussing ownership stakes in defense firms, Lutnick says
item.description: The commerce secretary said there was a “monstrous discussion” among Trump administration officials about taking partial ownership of defense giants d...

item.title: Democrat wins Iowa Senate race, upending Republican supermajority
item.description: An upset victory by Catelin Drey flips a seat formerly held by a Republican in the conservative-leaning district that Trump easily won in 2024.

item.title: "Mind-bendingly ridiculous": MAGA rages over Trump's Chinese students announcement
item.description: MAGA is outraged over President Trump's announcement that he'll allow 600,000 Chinese students to attend U.S. universities, which touches on several o...

item.title: Fed: Will follow any court ruling on Cook's status after Trump's firing
item.description: The Federal Reserve on Tuesday said it would "abide by any court decision" that determines whether top official Lisa Cook can be removed by President ...

item.title: Trump wants expanded death penalty, longer control over police in D.C.
item.description: The president calls for seeking the death penalty in all D.C. murder cases and wants to extend the current 30 day period of control over the city’s po...

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
